member.name: T:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase
member.summary: Base class for all SQLite classes. Implements methods for accessing SQLite database

member.name: M:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.Execute``1(System.String,System.Func{System.Data.Common.DbDataReader,``0})
member.summary: Executes a query sql statement with results

member.name: M:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.ExecuteScalar``1(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the first column of the first row cast to type T
member.returns: The first column of the first row cast to type T

member.name: M:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.GetGuid(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Guid associated with the column name
member.returns: Guid associated with the column name if exists, Guid.Empty otherwise

member.name: M:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.GetString(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the string associated with the column name
member.returns: String associated with the column name if exists, string.Empty otherwise

member.name: M:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.GetUri(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Uri associated with the column name
member.returns: Uri associated with the column name if exists, null otherwise

member.name: M:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.GetVersion(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Version associated with the column name
member.returns: Version associated with the column name if exists, null o therwise

member.name: M:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.GetDateTime(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the DateTime associated with the column name
member.returns: DateTime associated with the column name if exists, DateTime.MinValue otherwise

member.name: M:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.GetInt(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the int value associated with the column name
member.returns: Int value associated with the column name

member.name: M:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.GetLong(System.Data.Common.DbDataReader,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the long value associated with the column name
member.returns: Long value associated with the column name

member.name: M:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.IsDBNull(System.Object)
member.summary: Check if the obj is of type DBNull
member.returns: True if obj is of type DBNull, false otherwise

member.name: M:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.Format(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Formats the DateTime value to be compatible with SQLite DateTime type
member.returns: DateTime formatted to be compatible with SQLite

member.name: P:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.ConnectionString
member.summary: Initializes the connection string if empty and returns it

member.name: P:TNT.SQLite.SQLiteBase.Connection
member.summary: Returns a SQLite Connection associated with the connection string
